entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revise current experimental code-style options and promote them to be non-experimental #60539
  • Optimize `is` pattern when comparands are constant #60534
  • Some source generators stopped working with 6.0.200 SDK (file not found) #60532
  • EE ignores CultureInfo for comma vs. digit point #60530

Closed

  • CSharpSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error #54363
    Backlog
  • Should not offer "Implement interface" if only "Implement interface explicitly" is legal #4146
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary `<Compile Remove` #60538
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Remove unused abstract property `CodeFixCategory` #60536
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject usage #60526
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Move few `CodeFixProvider`s to Analyzers layer #60524
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
